descriptionHtml:
==GENERAL INFO==
Name: Ascentia
Level: 37
Race: Imperial
Civil War Affiliation: Imperial Legion
Dragonborn Destiny: Fulfilled
Dawnguard Affiliation: Dawnguard
Spouse: Lydia
Children: 2 daughters
Hearthfire Home: Heljarchen Hall

==EQUIPMENT==
Body Armor: Dragonscale Armor
Foot Armor: Dragonplate Boots
Arm Armor: Dragonplate Gauntlets
Head Armor: Unequipped
Weapons: Dragonbone Greatsword, Dragonbone Bow, Thunderbolt, Chain Lightning, Fast Healing

==SKILLS== 
Archery: 32
One Handed: 58
Two Handed: 75
Block: 46
Heavy Armor: 46
Light Armor: 59

Sneaking: 23
Pickpocketing: 23
Lockpicking: 35
Speech: 35

Destruction: 62
Restoration: 54
Alteration: 25
Conjuration: 19
Illusion: 18

Alchemy: 44
Enchanting: 60
Smithing: 100

==SAVE DOWNLOAD==
Required Expansions: Dawnguard, Hearthfire
Required Version: 1.7
Required Mods: No changes to the design of the Dragonscale and Dragonplate Armor
Required Mods to Maintain Character Appearance: Apachii Skyhair, Cloaks of Skyrim, Better Females

Place save file in C:/Users/Username/Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves Directory

Install advised mods to C:/Program Files (x86)/The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim/Data directory 

Apachii Skyhair, by Apachii: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Cloaks of Skyrim, by Noodles: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092
Better Females, by Bella: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
author: Jerry Peet
